## Container.addModules() method

Set multiple modules than going to enable an injection of couple services in the container and this will be available for usage in all components injectables.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addModules(modules: ModuleImport[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  modules | [ModuleImport](./cloudfunc.moduleimport.md)\[\] | Array of [ModuleImport](./cloudfunc.moduleimport.md) objects |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
